parameters: \n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”I see…\.\. In the end,\. the teacher cannot stop their student from reaching for their future.”
\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”The deeper into the tower you go, the more careful you should be.”
\msgwidth[auto]Don’t you ever forget.\.\. The promise we made back then…
\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>Don’t you ever forget.\.\. The promise we made back then…
\bust[2]\bustMirror[2]\bustSlideIn[2]\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”This area is off limits to humans.\.\.
Go back to where you came from.”
\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”This place is too dangerous for you.\.
It doesn’t matter whether you are a \c[6]child of God\c[0] or not.”
\bust[1]\bustSlideIn[1]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”Get out of my way.\. I must climb up the tower.”
\bustExp[2,1]\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”…I know how devoted you are to the temple.”
\bustExp[2,0]\n<\c[31]Ione\c[0]>”And that’s why,\. I’ll never let you pass.”
\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”I’m not doing this for the temple.”
\bustExp[1,3]\n<\c[21]Lucie\c[0]>”There’s someone I must meet up there.”
\msgwidth[auto]\c[18]\{"Then I have no choice to stop you."\.\.\.\.\.\^
